hero.title1: Labor shortage is a social issue.
hero.description: Aging population, lack of successors, increasing abandoned farmland. Someone has to solve this problem. That's why we gathered colleagues from around the world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.mission1Desc: Depopulating regions, weakening agriculture. We extend hands from around the world to places that cannot be reached by Japanese alone. We cross borders and become a bridge connecting land and people.
mission.mission2Desc: Not just labor. Housing, healthcare, language, culture—we remove all barriers and provide full-course support so they can obtain a 'place to live'.
mission.mission3Desc: Japan's farmland is now quietly disappearing. We are committed to reducing abandoned farmland by 1% annually and transforming abandoned land into fertile ground.

services.title: What We Can Do
services.dispatchDesc: Labor shortage—we respond to that voice in as little as 2 weeks. Ready-to-work foreign workers to your farm.
services.contractingDesc: Harvest and sorting, leave it all to us. Our team solves 'troubles' during busy seasons.
services.placementDesc: Not dispatch, but welcoming as colleagues. Careful matching towards direct employment.
services.itDesc: Digital for agriculture too. Web system and app development to evolve the field.
services.sugustaDesc: A place to learn for those who want to learn. Illuminating the path to Specified Skills level 2 completely free—social infrastructure for foreign workers.

numbers.title: Trust Proven by Results
numbers.relay: Achieving stable year-round employment with nationwide 'Harvest Relay'

whyUs.title: 6 Reasons We're Chosen
whyUs.reason1Title: As little as 2 weeks. That's our speed.
whyUs.reason1Desc: Labor shortage won't wait. That's why we deliver ready workers in 1.5 months typically, as little as 2 weeks.
whyUs.reason2Title: Navigating the visa maze at top speed
whyUs.reason2Desc: Complex residence status, cumbersome documents. With cooperation from our in-group supervisory organization, leave everything to us.
whyUs.reason3Desc: Japanese, English, Indonesian. 24-hour system to respond immediately to 'troubles' on site.
whyUs.reason4Desc: Housing arrangement, move-in/out, administrative procedures—we prepare a place to 'live' before they 'work'.
whyUs.reason5Title: Large special vehicles and forklifts too.
whyUs.reason5Desc: Not just workers. We carefully select experienced people in agriculture and livestock, license holders. Ready to work on site.
whyUs.reason6Title: If it doesn't fit, we replace.
whyUs.reason6Desc: Mismatches can happen. When they do, responding quickly—that's our responsibility.

cta.title1: Hands to cultivate are not enough.
cta.title2: We're going to answer that voice.
cta.description: As little as 2 weeks. Even just listening, something will surely change.

footer.tagline2: Supporting Japanese agriculture with the power of foreign workers.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions or consultations, please feel free to contact us.
contact.name: Name
